file(COPY  exclude tags correct_instance_parameters.cir.hspice correct_instance_parameters.cir correct_instance_parameters.cir.sh correct_instance_parameters_translation_inside_subckt.cir.hspice correct_instance_parameters_translation_inside_subckt.cir correct_instance_parameters_translation_inside_subckt.cir.sh capacitor_model_statements.cir capacitor_model_statements.cir.hspice capacitor_model_statements.cir.sh inductor_model_statements.cir inductor_model_statements.cir.hspice inductor_model_statements.cir.sh resistor_model_statements.cir resistor_model_statements.cir.hspice resistor_model_statements.cir.sh model_level_translation.cir model_level_translation.cir.hspice model_level_translation.cir.sh multiple_devices_same_model.cir multiple_devices_same_model.cir.hspice multiple_devices_same_model.cir.sh DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/correct_instance_parameters.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/correct_instance_parameters_translation_inside_subckt.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/capacitor_model_statements.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)

endif()
